protocol.text: 35S::WUS-GR; ap1-1;cal1-1 SAMs were either treated with 10μM Dex or mock solution for four hour. SAMs were simultaneously treated with 10μM Dex and 10μM Cycloheximide (Cyc), protein synthesis inhibitor and Cyc alone for four hours.
Arabidopsis thaliana 35S::WUS-GR ap1-1;cal1-1 plants were grown in growth room for 28 days. The shoot apices from these plants were used for RNA isolation after respective treatments.
RNA was isolated using RNeasy kit (Qiagen).
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol.
Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on ATH1 chip. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450. Affymetrix Hybridization oven 640
GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix Scanner 3000 with 7G upgrade

The probe set-to-locus mappings for the ATH1 chip were obtained from TAIR (2009). The normalization of the raw data Cel files was performed with the MAS5 algorithm using the default settings of the corresponding R function of the affy package (Gautier et al., 2004). The quality of the Affymetrix GeneChips was assessed with analysis routines provided by the affyPLM and arrayQualityMetrics packages (Bolstad et al., 2005; Kauffmann et al., 2009).
